subject: Re: box use concerns.
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
Sorry, I didn't meain it to sound like there was only one way. 
That's my biggest problem, unable to make myself understood. 

 Frank-S


 --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Laura Kimberley" <gjk1rrfan@...> 
wrote:
>
> Frank,
> Personally, I agree with the protection, but I do NOT BELIEVE there 
is
> anyone ONLY meant to do what you claim or anyone else that claims
> their the best for communicating with spirit this way! or any other 
way.
> 
> I for one have been doing this stuff for 18 years and I have never
> said allot, but that got my goat, end of story. I know that this 
type
> of communication and use of radios has been going on since 1988 and
> you stepped up to the plate and improved on the original process. 
> But, balanced people are strongly encouraged to always be aware of 
the
> emotional and mental issues that can possibly happen. Now for the UN
> BALANCED? Well, you have all experienced the results. So, lets drop
> the issue and get on with our spirituality and growth and learn 
more,
> and have fun doing it at the same dern time.
> 
> LK
> 
> 
> -- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@> 
wrote:
> >
> > 
> >  Hi All; We have been warned by others from time to time about
> unbridled box use, as it supposedly brings in negativity. I don't 
want
> to believe that, but there are a few cases of people using boxes 
made
> by me, as well as the hack radios, and going whacko big time. Its'
> either all ego--I'm the onlyest one that can use this, or like the
> more recent example. I don't know if these people were like this to
> start, or if it's an external influance, but it's discouraging. 
There
> seems to be a similar reaction with systems not made by me--so I've
> been told.
> >  
> >  Soooo, maybe burn some white candles, and maybe get a Rosary. My
> guys talk about the Catholics, and the Purple Princess has a 
Catholic
> connection on the etheric levels, although the church imposes too 
many
> limits on her. I wouldn't want to go into a state of fear, but a
> little protection stuff couldn't hurt. 
> >  
> >  Not only do I not have the time to mass produce boxes, I'm
> beginning to think it's not a good idea anyway. 
> >  
> >  Frank-S
> >  
> >  
> > _________________________________________________________________
> > Express yourself wherever you are. Mobilize!

Locale=en-US?ocid=TAG_APRIL
